modules.comments:
purescript-sigil — Typographic rendering for type signatures (HTML + SVG).

Re-exports the public API.
modules.name: Sigil

declarations.comments: Assign colors to type variables. Earlier variables get earlier palette slots.
declarations.title: assignVarColors

declarations.comments: Render a type synonym into a container element.
declarations.title: renderTypeSynonymInto

declarations.comments:
Render a type synonym to an HTML string.
Shows header (type + name + type params), then = body.
declarations.title: renderTypeSynonym

declarations.comments: Render a signet into a container element.
declarations.title: renderSignetInto

declarations.comments:
Render a signet (dots with rotated identifier labels) to HTML.
Same dot layout as the siglet, but each dot has a 45-degree rotated
label beneath it showing the type identifier name.
declarations.title: renderSignet

declarations.comments: Render a full-size signature into a container element.
declarations.title: renderSignatureInto

declarations.comments:
Render a full-size type signature to an HTML string.
Uses Swiss typographic layout: preamble (∀ left, constraints right),
declaration (name ::), body (indented with left rule).
declarations.title: renderSignature

declarations.comments: Render a siglet into a container element.
declarations.title: renderSigletInto

declarations.comments:
Render a siglet (miniature signature) to HTML.
Constrained type variables get pill style; unconstrained get colored text.
declarations.title: renderSiglet

declarations.comments: Render a foreign import into a container element.
declarations.title: renderForeignImportInto

declarations.comments:
Render a foreign import to an HTML string.
Shows header (foreign import + name), then :: body with preamble.
declarations.title: renderForeignImport

declarations.comments: Render a data declaration into a container element.
declarations.title: renderDataDeclInto

declarations.comments:
Render a data/newtype declaration to an HTML string.
Shows header (keyword + name + type params), then constructor branches
in a rail layout, or an opaque indicator if no constructors.
declarations.title: renderDataDecl

declarations.comments: Render a class declaration into a container element.
declarations.title: renderClassDeclInto

declarations.comments:
Render a type class definition to an HTML string.
Shows header (class + name + type params), superclass row,
own methods, and inherited methods grouped by superclass.
declarations.title: renderClassDecl

declarations.comments: Render a sigil body (no header) into a container element.
declarations.title: renderBodyInto

declarations.comments:
Render the sigil body only (no name header, no ::) to HTML.
Used for inline rendering in value cells when there's enough space.
Still shows preamble (quantifier + constraints) if present.
declarations.title: renderBody

declarations.comments:
Peel outermost forall quantifiers and constraints from the AST.
Nested foralls/constraints (rank-N, inside parens) are left intact.
declarations.title: peelSignature

declarations.comments: Escape HTML special characters.
declarations.title: escapeHtml

declarations.comments:
Parse a type signature string to RenderType.
Sanitizes loader artifacts (e.g. trailing comma before row variable)
before parsing.
declarations.title: parseToRenderType

declarations.comments:
Extract constructor argument types as RenderType values.
Constructor sigs look like "a -> b -> MyType a b" — returns [TVar "a", TVar "b"].
declarations.title: extractCtorRenderTypes

declarations.comments:
Extract constructor argument types from a constructor signature string.
Constructor sigs look like "a -> b -> MyType a b" — returns ["a", "b"] as text.
declarations.title: extractCtorArgs

declarations.comments:
Prepare AST for siglet rendering.
Preserves record/row structure (with elided field types) so the siglet
renderer can show `{ ○ ○ ○ }` notation. Forall, constraints, and parens
are kept. Normalizes `Record (row)` application to TRecord.
declarations.title: elideAST

declarations.comments: Render a signature into a DOM element selected by CSS selector.
declarations.title: renderSignatureIntoSvg

declarations.comments: Render a class definition into a DOM element selected by CSS selector.
declarations.title: renderClassDeclIntoSvg

declarations.comments: Render an ADT into a DOM element selected by CSS selector.
declarations.title: renderAdtIntoSvg

declarations.comments: Emit a single LayoutNode to a DOM element.
declarations.title: emitNode

declarations.comments: Emit a layout tree as a detached SVG element with the given dimensions.
declarations.title: emit

declarations.comments: Lay out a data type with constructor branches.
declarations.title: layoutADT

declarations.comments: Lay out a type class definition.
declarations.title: layoutClassDef

declarations.comments:
Lay out a siglet (elided miniature type signature).
TCon names render as small circles; TVar pills keep colors.
Layout mirrors the full-size sigil: constraint pile above, body middle,
forall row below.
Returns Nothing if the type can't fit.
declarations.title: layoutSiglet

declarations.comments: Lay out a value/type-synonym signature.
declarations.title: layoutSignature

declarations.comments: Lay out a sparkline miniature.
declarations.title: layoutSparkline

declarations.comments: Rendering context threaded through layout functions.
declarations.title: RenderContext

declarations.comments: Measure a RenderType node's dimensions.
declarations.title: measure

declarations.comments: Internal result from node-level layout: positioned nodes + consumed width.
declarations.title: RenderResult

declarations.comments:
A positioned SVG primitive. The entire layout pipeline produces these;
only `Emit` touches the DOM.
declarations.title: LayoutNode

declarations.comments: Render a RenderType back to plain text.
declarations.title: renderTypeToText

declarations.comments: Collect type variables from record/row fields.
declarations.title: fieldVars

declarations.comments: Collect all type variable names from a RenderType.
declarations.title: collectTypeVars

declarations.comments: Collect all forall-quantified variable names (including nested foralls).
declarations.title: collectForallVars

declarations.comments: Collect all params of an arrow chain (including return type at end).
declarations.title: collectArrowParams

declarations.comments:
Superclass info for class definition rendering.
Contains the class name and its required methods with optional parsed types.
declarations.title: SuperclassInfo

modules.comments: Color palettes and type variable color assignment.

declarations.comments: Tailwind 600-level palette for type variable pills (white text on colored bg).
declarations.title: typeVarPalette

declarations.comments: Assign colors to type variables. Earlier variables get earlier palette slots.
declarations.title: assignVarColors

modules.name: Sigil.Color

modules.comments:
Curated collection of PureScript type signatures for testing and demos.
50 examples across 17 categories covering the full range of PureScript
type syntax: simple values, functions, constraints, records, rows,
effects, HKT, rank-N, operators, kind signatures, and Halogen.
modules.name: Sigil.Examples

modules.comments:
HTML string rendering of type signatures with semantic markup.

Maps PureScript type concepts to semantic HTML elements:
  TVar       → <var>    (mathematical variable)
  TCon       → <code>   (type constructor / identifier)
  TArrow     → <ol>     (ordered parameter list)
  TRecord    → <dl>     (definition list: field → type)
  TForall    → <var>    (quantified variables)
  Constraint → <em>     (qualifying emphasis)
  separators → <small>  (::, →, ., parens — decorative punctuation)
  name       → <dfn>    (term being defined)

Visual appearance is entirely CSS-driven, enabling alternate renderings
of the same semantic document.

declarations.comments:
Render a full-size type signature to an HTML string.
Uses Swiss typographic layout: preamble (∀ left, constraints right),
declaration (name ::), body (indented with left rule).

Peel outermost forall quantifiers and constraints from the AST.

modules.name: Sigil.Html

modules.comments:
CST → RenderType conversion.

Parses PureScript type signature strings via language-cst-parser
and converts to the rendering-friendly RenderType AST.

declarations.comments:
Parse a type signature string to RenderType.
Sanitizes loader artifacts (e.g. trailing comma before row variable)
before parsing.
declarations.title: parseToRenderType

declarations.comments:
Extract constructor argument types from a constructor signature string.
Constructor sigs look like "a -> b -> MyType a b" — returns ["a", "b"] as text.
declarations.title: extractCtorArgs

declarations.comments:
Extract constructor argument types as RenderType values.
Constructor sigs look like "a -> b -> MyType a b" — returns [TVar "a", TVar "b"].
declarations.title: extractCtorRenderTypes

declarations.comments:
Prepare AST for siglet rendering.
Preserves record/row structure (with elided field types) so the siglet
renderer can show `{ ○ ○ ○ }` notation. Forall, constraints, and parens
are kept. Normalizes `Record (row)` application to TRecord.
declarations.title: elideAST

modules.name: Sigil.Parse

modules.comments:
Shared LayoutNode → SVG attribute mapping.

Both `Emit` (DOM FFI) and `Sigil.Hats` (HATS Tree) derive from
`toSvgPrimitive` so attribute logic is defined once.
modules.name: Sigil.Svg.Attrs

modules.comments:
Emit: LayoutNode → Effect Element.

Uses shared attribute mapping from `Sigil.Svg.Attrs` and calls thin
SVG DOM FFI helpers.

declarations.comments: Emit a layout tree as a detached SVG element with the given dimensions.
declarations.title: emit

declarations.comments: Emit a single LayoutNode to a DOM element.
declarations.title: emitNode

declarations.comments: Render a class definition into a DOM element selected by CSS selector.
declarations.title: renderClassDeclIntoSvg

declarations.title: renderSignatureIntoSvg

declarations.comments: Render an ADT into a DOM element selected by CSS selector.
declarations.title: renderAdtIntoSvg

modules.name: Sigil.Svg.Emit

modules.comments:
Core layout functions: pure RenderType → LayoutNode conversion.

All functions are pure — they produce positioned LayoutNode trees
without touching the DOM.

declarations.comments: Peel off outer forall and constraint layers.
declarations.title: unwrapType

declarations.comments: Parse "Foldable f" → { name: "Foldable", params: ["f"] }.
declarations.title: parseClassName

declarations.comments:
Lay out a RenderType node at position (x, y). Returns positioned
LayoutNodes and the horizontal width consumed.
declarations.title: renderNode

declarations.comments: Small variable pill for annotations (forall row, class row).
declarations.title: renderSmallPill

declarations.comments: Siglet var dot: filled colored circle for multi-letter type variables.
declarations.title: renderSigletVarDot

declarations.comments:
Constraint pile (stacked rounded rects with dashed connector).
In siglet mode, class names become dots and args use renderNode
(so multi-letter vars → dots, single-letter → pills, TCon → dots).
declarations.title: renderConstraintPile

modules.name: Sigil.Svg.Layout

modules.comments: Class definition layout: header, superclasses, own methods, inherited methods.

declarations.title: layoutClassDef

modules.name: Sigil.Svg.Layout.ClassDef

modules.comments:
Siglet layout: elided type signature showing arity, structure, and variable patterns.

Concrete type names become colored circles; type variable pills keep their colors.
Forall and constraint annotations are rendered in the same zones as the
full-size sigil: constraints above, body middle, forall below.

declarations.comments:
Lay out a siglet (elided miniature type signature).
TCon names render as small circles; TVar pills keep colors.
Layout mirrors the full-size sigil: constraint pile above, body middle,
forall row below.
Returns Nothing if the type can't fit.
declarations.title: layoutSiglet

modules.comments: Sparkline layout: miniature type signature for treemap cells.

declarations.comments: Lay out a sparkline miniature.
declarations.title: layoutSparkline

modules.name: Sigil.Svg.Layout.Sparkline

modules.comments:
Pure measurement functions for type signature layout.

Computes dimensions (width, height) for any RenderType node
using character-width arithmetic. No DOM access.

declarations.title: varPillWidth

declarations.title: sigletDotWidth

declarations.comments: Measure a RenderType node's dimensions.
declarations.title: measure

declarations.comments: Measure a record/row table.
declarations.title: measureTable

declarations.comments:
Measure a field type (used inside record tables). Handles nested
records and uses full measure for applied types.
declarations.title: measureFieldFull

declarations.comments: Rendering context threaded through layout functions.
declarations.title: RenderContext
